named-native-query.name: UsuarioModel.buscaPorNome
named-native-query.query: select * from USUARIOCAT..TB_USU_USUARIO where usu_nome like ?1 + '%' order by usu_nome

named-native-query.name: UsuarioModel.buscaPorPerfil
named-native-query.query: select * from USUARIOCAT..TB_USU_USUARIO where per_codPerfil = ?1 order by usu_nome

named-native-query.name: UsuarioModel.buscaPorStatus
named-native-query.query: select * from USUARIOCAT..TB_USU_USUARIO where usu_flUsuario = ?1 order by usu_nome

named-native-query.name: UsuarioModel.buscaTodos
named-native-query.query: select * from USUARIOCAT..TB_USU_USUARIO order by usu_nome
